amendment.description: To maintain current delivery time for market-dominant products.

action.text: Amendment SA 2042 proposed by Senator Casey to Amendment SA 2000.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2042, under the order of 4/19/2012, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 44 - 54. Record Vote Number: 80.
